title: I can't invite friends-Nor can they invite me
body:
Me and my mate are trying to invite eachother into games (rank flex) and it is not working, also we are trying other methods like inviting eachother into norms games/private custom games. Nothing is working. The only way we can play is if I make a custom lobby and he joins through the custom lobby list. help please and thank you..

PS. if I invite some one it will come up with 'An unexpected error has occurred' and if I try to make games occasionally the same error will pop up. AND the shop does the same thing collection etc.. (all options on the client do this*only for tonight though*)

replies.body: Hey there, either you or your friend (maybe both) could be having an unstable connection that's losing sync with matchmaking and pvp.net.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if that will fix things up!

Hi, thanks for the reply it appears the bug has fixed itself. But it was nothing to do with connection to the servers as I was getting 19 ping in a custom game with him, he was getting 25. It was simply something to do with the matchmaking not letting us invite eachother if we did, it would come up 'an error has occurred, please try again' and continued repeating. we both could go solo but NOT duo. If this happens again I'll make another thread till then thanks for the reply. ^.^ (we are the same elo bracket aswell, so that's not the issue especially in norms)
